posts.post_content: Very versatile, can fetch any instant or card with flash you need. The flashback is what makes this card really good. It gives you an extra spell which can be used to chain Teachings together for maximum card advantage or get another answer.
posts.html:

Posted By: dberry02 (1/8/2011 3:21:03 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Instant tutor with flashback? I believe this alone would have enabled the whole deck back when this was in Standard. Even if [Teferi](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Teferi) hadn't existed, you could still literally drown them with the card advantage this generates.
  
   
This one card fetches you 2 [Careful Consideration](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Careful Consideration)s minimum, all alone and at instant speed. What more could you ask of a control card? Counter something and tapping their team at the same time, with two more possible good options?
posts.html:
